challenges.name: Bonfire: Arguments Optional
description: Create a function that sums two arguments together. If only one argument is provided, return a function that expects one additional argument and will return the sum.
For example, add(2, 3) should return 5, and add(2) should return a function that is waiting for an argument so that var sum2And = add(2); return sum2And(3); // 5
If either argument isn't a valid number, return undefined.
Remember to use [RSAP](//github.com/FreeCodeCamp/freecodecamp/wiki/How-to-get-help-when-you-get-stuck) if you get stuck. Try to pair program. Write your own code.
